items.sentence: Tom thought the amulet would one day protect him from witches.

I wanted to keep my job, so I did what the boss told me to do.
Tom knew that he couldn\'t speak French as well as Mary could.
Tom knew that he wasn\'t going to get home in time for dinner.
Tom is taking a walk with Mary and should be back before long.
Tom is the only person I personally know who can speak French.
Tom suggested that the meeting be postponed until next Monday.
You\'re probably too young to understand why Tom had to leave.
Tom speaks French with his mother and English with his father.
Tom didn\'t understand why he was different from other people.

I knew you were crazy, but I didn\'t know you were this crazy.
